versions.version: - Adds OData and SQL 92 queries on SQLDb. Update dependencies.
- Fix 3.1 compatibility.
- Remove net461 support, update dependencies.
- Refactor dependencies.
- Introduce SQL Injection projection. Update dependencies.
- Update dependencies, fix disposing of connection mutexes
- Add IEntityContext interface. Add support calls that returns a scalar (e.g.) Count(), Sum() and so to LINQ queries
Add resiliency policy support
Add cancellation token to async methods, add netcore Oracle driver
Add cancellation token to async methods, add netcore Oracle driver
Add LockAsync()
Change synchronization approach from SyncRoot to Lock method
Add a update manager async version
Further improve async implementation
Improve async implementation, add reading blob as stream method
Add SyncRoot to the connection class, update dependencies
Async methods are introduced
Mongo Only update
Mongo Only update
Update dependencies
Add count(distinct) support, improve entity query builder syntax sugar, refactor Bson and Mongo

project.description: Common SQL-based implementation of entity framework.
Implementation of SQL 92 queries to be executed via SqlDb package.
OData supoirt for GS.EF entity framework.
Microsoft SQL Server implementation of entity framework
